description:
I have never heard of a single man who had his tentacles on as many institutions as Bill Gates. He is monopolizing the world. It is extremely malevolent to give this much power to one person. He has poisoned children in 3rd world countries with his vaccines for years. He hosted a ""pandemic exercise"" with Johns Hopkins University on October 2019. Magically, three months later,  the world was accosted by a ""real"" pandemic. He has also stated in multiple televised interviews/talks that he'd like to reduce the earth's population, and vaccines would help with that. He wants to insert chips in people to track them and keep track of their vaccine status. He wants to spray nanoparticles into the sky to block out the sun to stop ""climate change."" I'm telling you, if the antichrist is alive today, this is him.
